org.efaps.db.store

Class JDBCStoreResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.db.transaction.AbstractResource
      • org.efaps.db.store.AbstractStoreResource
        • org.efaps.db.store.JDBCStoreResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XAResource, Resource

    public class JDBCStoreResource
extends AbstractStoreResource
    The class implements the Resource interface for SQL blobs. For each file id a new JDBC store resource must be created.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

      • write

        public long write(InputStream _in,
         long _size,
         String _fileName)
           throws EFapsException
        The method writes the context (from the input stream) into a SQL blob.
        Parameters:
        _in - input stream defined the content of the file
        _size - length of the content (or negative meaning that the length is not known; then the content gets the length of readable bytes from the input stream) return size of the created temporary file object
        _fileName - name of the file
        Returns:
        size of the file
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Deletes the file defined in #fileId.

      • read

        public InputStream read()
                 throws EFapsException
        Returns for the file the input stream.
        Returns:
        input stream of the file with the content
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • prepare

        public int prepare(Xid _xid)
        Ask the resource manager to prepare for a transaction commit of the transaction specified in xid. (used for 2-phase commits).
        Parameters:
        _xid - global transaction identifier (not used, because each file with the file id gets a new VFS store resource instance)
        Returns:
        always 0

      • commit

        public void commit(Xid _xid,
          boolean _onePhase)
        The method is called from the transaction manager if the complete transaction is completed.
        Nothing is to do here, because the commitment is done by the ConnectionResource instance.
        Parameters:
        _xid - global transaction identifier (not used, because each file with the file id gets a new VFS store resource instance)
        _onePhase - true if it is a one phase commitment transaction (not used)

      • rollback

        public void rollback(Xid _xid)
        If the file written in the virtual file system must be rolled back, only the created temporary file (created from method write(java.io.InputStream, long, java.lang.String)) is deleted.
        Parameters:
        _xid - global transaction identifier (not used, because each file with the file id gets a new VFS store resource instance)

      • forget

        public void forget(Xid _xid)
        Tells the resource manager to forget about a heuristically completed transaction branch.
        Parameters:
        _xid - global transaction identifier (not used, because each file with the file id gets a new VFS store resource instance)

      • getTransactionTimeout

        public int getTransactionTimeout()
        Obtains the current transaction timeout value set for this XAResource instance.
        Returns:
        always 0

      • recover

        public Xid[] recover(int _flag)
        Obtains a list of prepared transaction branches from a resource manager.
        Parameters:
        _flag - flag
        Returns:
        always null

      • setTransactionTimeout

        public boolean setTransactionTimeout(int _seconds)
        Sets the current transaction timeout value for this XAResource instance.
        Parameters:
        _seconds - number of seconds
        Returns:
        always true
